title: Remove the top banner image from all pages

requirements.text: Remove the top banner image section from the app layout so no photo/image is displayed above the sticky header on any page.
acceptanceCriteria: The app no longer renders the TopBanner area above the header on all routes.
The header remains sticky at the top (no blank banner space above it).
No visual regressions occur in page layout spacing on mobile (e.g., iPhone SE) and desktop.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components).
Do not edit files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose around them instead).
nonGoals: Do not change the header, footer, routing, or any page content beyond removing the top banner image.
Do not change backend behavior, data models, or Internet Identity authentication.
